_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Qualities to develop to cross over Death: Leaving home behind for the seclusion so hard to enjoy
Try to find delight there, having left behind sensual pleasures
With no possessions, cleanse themselves of mental corruptions
The minds rightly developed in the awake: With defilements ended, brilliant, they are extinguished in this world.
